If you have any questions, requests or need help, you can always turn to them:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4936,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e96c3f96-08c7-4b40-9dd2-9632e45ec593/hr contact.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e96c3f96-08c7-4b40-9dd2-9632e45ec593/hr contact.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hr contact.png\",\"name\":\"hr contact.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e96c3f96-08c7-4b40-9dd2-9632e45ec593\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":700,\"height\":45},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR Contact is a member of your local People Management team, who will help you get settled at EPAM. You are assigned an HR Contact from your first day with us. On your Onboarding Portal, you can always see who your HR Contact is and quickly connect with them through the “PEOPLE WHO MAY HELP” section. You may contact them with any questions you have related to your employment with EPAM, except for those related to your project. Your dedicated People Specialist will be in touch with you in the first week of you joining as well as regularly during your probationary period and after.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can reach out to your Unit People Partner if you enhance your onboarding, your Resource Manager can assign to you a \\\"Buddy\\\" - one of your peers who can provide advice and guidance on different aspects of your work. A Buddy helps you to acclimate to EPAM’s (or the customer's) culture and workplace.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1525,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02e57858-e314-4309-bd46-5daf56ea3b3e/mentor.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02e57858-e314-4309-bd46-5daf56ea3b3e/mentor.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"mentor.png\",\"name\":\"mentor.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"02e57858-e314-4309-bd46-5daf56ea3b3e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":701,\"height\":48},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we have many mentoring programs aimed at teaching basic primary skills or new technologies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentor is a person who has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the professional area, motivated to spend personal time for knowledge transfer. If you feel that your expertise needs to be developed or want to acquire new skills and knowledge required for working on a project, you can take part in our Mentoring program where you will be given a Mentor.
